Our Story

Ehitech was established in 2015 by Prince EHIGIATOR MOMOH and started by doing Web design, Architectural designs and home inspection within Nigeria and is now working on being one of the largest freelancer across the world

Menu

WE OFFER INDIVIDUAL SOLUTIONS TO MEET YOUR EXPECTATIONS AND GIVE YOU AND YOUR PARTY A UNIQUE EXPERIENCE. WE CAN HELP YOU ARRANGE A BUSINESS DINNER, PRIVATE OR WORK RELATED PARTIES LIKE SUMMER OR CHRISTMAS PARTIES. WE ALSO HAVE MANY GREAT SOLUTIONS FOR THOSE OF YOU, WHO WOULD PREFER A TABLE IN A BIT MORE PRIVATE ATMOSPHERE OR CHAMBRE SÉPARÉE

The perfect

Blend

Culinary

Delight

For parties exceeding 9 guests, please contact us via the booking request form, and our dedicated booking staff will contact you. If you cannot find the day or time you wish to reserve your table for, please contact us for further assistance. Your reservation will automatically dedicate a leave-by-time. If you would like to reduce or extend the leave by time, please post a comment in your reservation. Peking duck menu must be booked two days in advance by sending an e-mail
